name: warpcorrect
synopsis: Replaces voxels in a deformation field that point to a specific out of bounds location with nan,nan,nan
author: David Raffelt (david.raffelt@florey.edu.au) & Max Pietsch (mail@maxpietsch.com)

description: This can be used in conjunction with the warpinit command to compute a MRtrix compatible deformation field from non-linear transformations generated by any other registration package.

options.description: single value or a comma separated list of values that define out of bounds voxels in the input warp image. Default: (0,0,0).
numerical precision used for L2 matrix norm comparison. Default: 9.99999975e-06.
do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.
force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).
use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).
temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.
display this information page and exit.
